properties.Description: The properties that define the service topology.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

artifactSourceId.Description: The resource Id of the artifact source that contains the artifacts that can be referenced in the service units.

properties.Description: The properties that define a service in a service topology.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

targetLocation.Description: The Azure location to which the resources in the service belong to or should be deployed to.

targetSubscriptionId.Description: The subscription to which the resources in the service belong to or should be deployed to.

properties.Description: The properties that define the service unit.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

targetResourceGroup.Description: The Azure Resource Group to which the resources in the service unit belong to or should be deployed to.

deploymentMode.Description: Describes the type of ARM deployment to be performed on the resource.

artifacts.Description: The artifacts for the service unit.

templateUri.Description: The full URI of the ARM template file with the SAS token.

parametersUri.Description: The full URI of the ARM parameters file with the SAS token.

templateArtifactSourceRelativePath.Description: The path to the ARM template file relative to the artifact source.

parametersArtifactSourceRelativePath.Description: The path to the ARM parameters file relative to the artifact source.

properties.Description: The properties that define the step.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

duration.Description: The duration in ISO 8601 format of how long the wait should be.

properties.Description: Defines the properties that make up a rollout request.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

buildVersion.Description: The version of the build being deployed.

artifactSourceId.Description: The reference to the artifact source resource Id where the payload is located.

targetServiceTopologyId.Description: The resource Id of the service topology from which service units are being referenced in step groups to be deployed.

stepGroups.Description: The list of step groups that define the orchestration.

status.Description: The current status of the rollout.

totalRetryAttempts.Description: The cardinal count of total number of retries performed on the rollout at a given time.

services.Description: The detailed information on the services being deployed.

name.Description: The name of the step group.

dependsOnStepGroups.Description: The list of step group names on which this step group depends on.

preDeploymentSteps.Description: The list of steps to be run before deploying the target.

deploymentTargetId.Description: The resource Id of service unit to be deployed. The service unit should be from the service topology referenced in targetServiceTopologyId

postDeploymentSteps.Description: The list of steps to be run after deploying the target.

stepId.Description: The resource Id of the step to be run.

retryAttempt.Description: The ordinal count of the number of retry attempts on a rollout. 0 if no retries of the rollout have been performed. If the rollout is updated with a PUT, this count is reset to 0.

skipSucceededOnRetry.Description: True, if all steps that succeeded on the previous run/attempt were chosen to be skipped in this retry attempt. False, otherwise.

startTime.Description: The start time of the rollout in UTC.

endTime.Description: The start time of the rollout in UTC. This property will not be set if the rollout has not completed yet.

error.Description: The detailed error information for any failure.

serviceUnits.Description: The detailed information about the units that make up the service.

targetLocation.Description: The Azure location to which the resources in the service belong to or should be deployed to.

targetSubscriptionId.Description: The subscription to which the resources in the service belong to or should be deployed to.

targetResourceGroup.Description: The Azure Resource Group to which the resources in the service unit belong to or should be deployed to.

deploymentMode.Description: Describes the type of ARM deployment to be performed on the resource.

artifacts.Description: The artifacts for the service unit.

stepGroup.Description: The step group the current step is part of.

operationInfo.Description: Detailed information of specific action execution.

resourceOperations.Description: Set of resource operations that were performed, if any, on an Azure resource.

deploymentName.Description: The name of the ARM deployment initiated as part of the step.

correlationId.Description: Unique identifier to track the request for ARM-based resources.

startTime.Description: Start time of the action in UTC.

endTime.Description: End time of the action in UTC.

lastUpdatedTime.Description: Last time in UTC this operation was updated.

error.Description: The errors, if any, for the action.

resourceName.Description: Name of the resource as specified in the artifacts. For ARM resources, this is the name of the resource specified in the template.

operationId.Description: Unique identifier of the operation. For ARM resources, this is the operationId obtained from ARM service.

resourceType.Description: Type of the resource as specified in the artifacts. For ARM resources, this is the type of the resource specified in the template.

provisioningState.Description: State of the resource deployment. For ARM resources, this is the current provisioning state of the resource.

statusMessage.Description: Descriptive information of the resource operation.

statusCode.Description: Http status code of the operation.

timeStamp.Description: Time in UTC this message was provided.

properties.Description: The properties that define the artifact source.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

sourceType.Description: The type of artifact source used.

artifactRoot.Description: The path from the location that the 'authentication' property [say, a SAS URI to the blob container] refers to, to the location of the artifacts. This can be used to differentiate different versions of the artifacts. Or, different types of artifacts like binaries or templates. The location referenced by the authentication property concatenated with this optional artifactRoot path forms the artifact source location where the artifacts are expected to be found.

authentication.Description: The authentication method to use to access the artifact source.

sasUri.Description: The SAS URI to the Azure Storage blob container. Any offset from the root of the container to where the artifacts are located can be defined in the artifactRoot.
